Reviews.Content: Well, NIKON is a great  name in cameras and this one does the job.  As a :Point and Shoot", it fits the bill.  Small enough to fit in pocket, purse, or pouch.  It is pretty, too.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: The image quality was pretty good—it didn't blow me away, but I also realize this is a small point-and-shoot, so it was acceptable for what it is. However, the reason I purchased the camera was for the Wi-Fi, so that I could take better-quality shots than my iPhone, but still be able to share them via Instagram and Facebook immediately, without having to wait to go home and upload them onto my computer. The Wi-Fi almost never connected, and I was doing everything correctly. I am sending it back, hopefully Nikon can fix this glitch.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: John E. Lynch
Reviews.Content: Didn't realize that the camera DID NOT INCLUDE memory chip.  Would have appreciated alert so I could have ordered the gift + the memory card.  Perhaps the web site disclosed the issue, but I didn't, obviously, see any alert.Amazon is AMAZING and no wonder people avoid miserable stores and favour the web

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Lov2read
Reviews.Content: this is an excellent quality and price for such a versatile camera. Loaded with features and compact to carry anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Clew
Reviews.Content: Great pictures and videos super simple and pocket size. Just what I was looking for! Amazon made it easy to find and quick to receive.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Steven Casada
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for several reasons.  The brand, the reviews and the options plus the WI-FI feature.  As of today I am extremely satisfied.  i would highly recommend this camera.  Extremely simple to use but packed with a lot of great features.  You just can't go wrong buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: I love the camera - But
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey S. Brown
Reviews.Content: The advertisement said I would receive a 16 GB SD card with the purchase at no cost to me.  The card did not arrive with the package.  I do not know who to contact at Amazon about that.  You are only asked to comment not the delivery and the product or to return the item.  There is not an option to ask about a missing piece that was part of a promotion to help sell the camera.I hope by writing this Amazon will correct this an place an "other" response area for us to use.I am quite happy with all the products I've bought here and also with Amazon Prime.  This is the first time I have run into this problem.

Reviews.Title: Great features for the price.
Reviews.Author: papa
Reviews.Content: so far,no problems, bought this for my wife as she was headed on a cuise by herself, and wanted  a camera that was durable and take decent memory pix for her trip.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for price!
Reviews.Author: AliM
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! Its a little bit slow when you turn it on and off but that is my only complaint about it!

Reviews.Title: Okay, not great
Reviews.Author: Kristy Stout
Reviews.Content: I got this camera after researching for quite a while but needing to buy something more local or fast.  I had a Sony Cybershot that was a lower pixel, lower zoom and took amazing pictures but broke.  So I got this one.  It can take great pictures but I have to do pictures over over and many are blurry.  It's very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: agedrunner "agedrunner"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent point and shoot camera that will easily fit in a shirt pocket.  The image quality is excellent and the camera has many features which are useful, including several in camera editing options.

Reviews.Title: easy and fun
Reviews.Author: no name
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my teenaged grand daughter; she is very happy with the size, the weight, the zoom and the ease of taking good candid phoros.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix s6500
Reviews.Author: Carleton W. Hart
Reviews.Content: Good value, earlier version works well.  Surprised that wireless feature only works to a smart phone with special app.  Would like to wirelessly transfer photos to pc as well. .Color options for case is great idea.  Arrived a day earlier than promised, which was a nice surprise.  .

Reviews.Title: Cannon coolpix
Reviews.Author: Braulio Baeza jr
Reviews.Content: All I had expected and more great buy the wi fi feature make it easy to share pictures memory cards are pricey

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Lectroman "George"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for our trip to Italy. It was perfect for us. Took great pictures even inside where they don't allow flash. Has a Museum setting which I used a lot. Pictures came out great and it fits in my front pocket!

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE
Reviews.Author: Naomi Donalson
Reviews.Content: I HAVE BEEN REAL HAPPY WITH THIS NEW CAMERA. THE MULTI FOCUSING IS A MAJOR PLUS, ALONG WITH BEING ABLE TO TAKE PICS WHILE IN MOTION. IT TOOK A LITTLE GETTING USED TO THE NEW CAMERA, BUT SO FAR WELL WORTH THE EFFORT.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: starman
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase for me.  The camera did everything I could ask for.  I don't consider myself very technologically savvy, and this camera is extremely easy to use.

Reviews.Title: I enjoy it, really good
Reviews.Author: sandra salas
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera for me and family,y just have a small complaint and is the battery lasts long, need one backup if you used it all day.

Reviews.Title: its a very good camera
Reviews.Author: Ben Jule
Reviews.Content: i ordered for it and got it on time, it met my expectations, i have been using sony but just to try this, it is just as specified. i have not use it for long but for the time been it is okay. but no memory card in it. the batter is ok

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S6500 Wi-Fi Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Papoo
Reviews.Content: The camera performed as it should, we are still getting use to it, but the camera is working as it should.

Reviews.Title: Producto defectuoso.- Defective Product. -
Reviews.Author: Martin Pera Cecchi
Reviews.Content: Luego de 35 días de uso normal la cámara digital dejo de funcionarNunca se golpeo y solo se sacaron 200 fotos. El producto estaba fallado, ahora no puedo reclamar porque pasaron 30 días.-Muy triste, No recomiendo la compra de este producto.-After 35 days of normal use digital camera stopped workingNever hit and only took 200 photos. The product was failed, now I can not claim it's 30 days. -Very sad, I do not recommend the purchase of this product. -

Reviews.Title: Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: Cheyan A. Steele
Reviews.Content: great unit for the money.  worked great as soon as it was charged.  happy, happy, happy.  Takes pictures like it should

Reviews.Title: Great image quality, especially in low-lighting
Reviews.Author: Joshua "Josh"
Reviews.Content: I'll mention first that I was disappointed in the wi-fi feature. Being able to connect to the internet to upload photos to Flickr, Picasa, Facebook, or whatever was what I was expecting. The way it actually works was a little disappointing. Though the manual explains the feature pretty well:The camera’s built-in Wi-Fi (wireless LAN) function* allows you to remotely release the shutterof the camera by operating a smart device that is wirelessly connected to the camera.The camera’s monitor view is displayed on the screen of the wirelessly connected smartdevice, enabling you to remotely zoom the camera in or out on the subject. You can alsotransfer saved images from the camera to the smart device.* To use the Wi-Fi (wireless LAN) function, Wireless Mobile Utility must be installed on the smartdeviceLuckily I have a smartphone or it would have been even more disappointing. I was able to get it connected to my phone after a few tries. The app that I had to install on my android phone was pretty lack-luster and could definitely use some polishing, though it did the job.It potentially provides a way to send/share photos when out-and-about or on vacation which could be useful for some. It also lets you use your phone as a viewfinder for the camera and lets you remotely snap photos. This could be especially useful when using a tripod to eliminate camera movement. This is great for me since I bought the camera to photograph my artwork. In retrospect, the way the wi-fi feature actually works will probably prove more useful to me than my assumed social media connectivity.More importantly, I was very impressed with the image quality, especially when taking low-light photos. Taking a photo of a dimly lit room transforms it into a well lit room. The photos I took of darkly lit scenes actually looked better lit than they did when looking at the scene with a naked eye. I haven't messed with most of the other features of the phone yet. The retouch options seemed similar to something like Instagram filters which could be handy at some point. Of course, being able to connect your phone via wi-fi means that you could just use Instagram or any other photo editor on your phone.The only other negative I can think of is that it takes a few seconds to boot up from being powered off (there is a standby mode though), which could be an issue for people to snap photos spontaneously. Still, it's faster than opening the camera app on my phone. I bought the camera so I would stop using my phone as a camera (Optimus Elite) and to photograph artwork and other potentially low-light scenes. This camera fills that need perfectly and I would definitely recommend it for the price range.

Reviews.Title: I like it !
Reviews.Author: Janet Puig
Reviews.Content: I really like it. It zooms, does continuous shooting, has a large view screen and it even lets me crop photos while still in the camera.

Reviews.Title: Meh... Big disappointment.
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Pictures are okay... I thought they'd be crisper and better in low light.I am EXTREMELY disappointed with the built-in wi-fi option. It's not quick, it's not easy, and really, why bother... Certain "things" need to be set in place for you to even be able to enable the wi-fi option. Super annoying when you don't have a manual handy. I hate how it shows you the option, but you can't change anything on it unless these "conditions" are met. Screw it. Cumbersome. Crap. I should've went with the Sony. They're always a lot easier to use right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera but beware if you purchase
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Jung II "retired banker"
Reviews.Content: Good little camera if you want more than what the iphone camera can do but it has two major drawbacks.  The battery life is very short which has been indicated in other reviews and the wifi function needs better explanation on set up and must function better.  You have to set it up every time you want to use it and requires many button pushes.  Then it does not stay on and you have to redo it.....very irritating.  I couldn't get it to work again after an hour of trying to figure it out and then read in manual that when battery has 30% life left, the wifi function stops working!  Very disappointed in Nikon engineering as I purchased this little camera because of the name.  Speaking of little...this is a very little camera so if you have big fingers, you will not enjoy pushing very little buttons.

Reviews.Title: Canera Delight!
Reviews.Author: James E. Restivo
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife,because she complained my camera was to large for her to carry in her handbag and to cumbersome and hard for her to use. She is delighted with her small camera and she loves the clarity and brightness of the pictures color. She never leaves the house without it. I don't believe I could have made a better present selection if I would have tried. I also believe this camera is a delight.

Reviews.Title: Fun camera for a college student
Reviews.Author: deb t
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and take good pictures in low light.  Be sure to buy the Kapaxen Two High Capacity (1000mAh) EN-EL19 Battery Packs & Charger so you will never be out of power.

Reviews.Title: Great Product Great Seller
Reviews.Author: Wayne Hall
Reviews.Content: The camera does a great.  I am quite impressed with the wi fi capability to download pictures to my tablet wirelessly.Very good and the seller did an excellent job of shipping and getting it to me in recoed time.A+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++goose20

Reviews.Title: Mikon Coolpix S6500
Reviews.Author: springgulch95
Reviews.Content: The camera has excellent resolution and has met all of our expectations. I would recommend it as an intermediate camera for travel, family gatherings, etc.

Reviews.Title: Colors
Reviews.Author: G Wing Racer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for to taking pictures using incandescent lights. This camera falls far short of showing the real colors. Everything has a reddish tint to it when using the incandescent setting.

Reviews.Title: Cool, like in Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: Beautifully crafted & simple to use. Everyone should have one, besides their cell phone cameras. It would have helped if Nikonhad crafted a nice case for it.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera For the Price
Reviews.Author: Beatrice
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Europe. What I was mainly looking for was a small size that was comfortable to carry around. I was also looking for decent zoom for when I took pictures of landmarks and vistas, especially when I wanted to get the details in the work. At the same time, I wanted something that could focus quickly, and overall had a quick learning curve. I have to say I was quite impressed with the camera. I was a little unsure at first but it really takes nice pictures especially for the price. Playing around with it for a few days really taught what certain buttons did, what settings applied depending on the lighting. I was really surprised by the retouching software that comes in the camera. Its kind of fun to play around with and if used lightly it can really have a nice realistic effect since it does things like reduce redness in skin, increase eye size, change face size, etc. One of things I did not like was the fact that the camera is charged by connecting a cable from an outlet directly to the camera. I would have preferred a wall charger for the camera so I could have a spare battery charging while using the camera for taking pictures. While the battery has decent battery life, when I was out sightseeing, I had to be conscious about not keeping the camera turned on so that I did not inadvertently drain the battery. But overall a very nice camera and really serves its purpose for taking great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: paulie gee "paulie"
Reviews.Content: great camera but I had to return it as I bought it for my daughter and her boyfriend already bought one for her.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: M. Hooft
Reviews.Content: This was a great choice for a "good" camera without spending thousands of dollars!  The picture quality is exceptional and I'm able to blow up the pictures and not lose any of the clarity.

Reviews.Title: Of course I love this thing
Reviews.Author: Dan Girard
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. My girlfriend loves playing with it.  Zoom is awesome.  Lots of picture options to fiddle with.  Balls

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Moe
Reviews.Content: I had a Sony before this Nikon and went with it because others I know have taken great photos with it, not to mention the affordability and the quality of a Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Nikoncoolpix S6500 Camera
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Hamel
Reviews.Content: I love it and finding it easy to use.  It fits so easily in my hands and can carry with me, love the orange.  gives a great picture and love that you can see before permanently saved.  .

Reviews.Title: My favorite digital camera so far!
Reviews.Author: Bargain Hound
Reviews.Content: I've owned lots of digital cameras. My last one was a Kodak, and I loved it so much, I didn't think another one would compare.  It finally broke on me, and I decided on this camera after shopping around for quite some time.  I couldn't be happier with my purchase!  This was my first Nikon digital camera and I'm very impressed.  The quality of pictures I get are amazing, it's very easy to use, download, etc.  I read some of the reviews where people said they couldn't get it to focus, but I had no problem with the focus.  It even has WIFI features, which I haven't even tried yet.  If this camera broke on me, I'd go out and buy the same one!  I love it.  And, it came in my favorite color :)

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Avid Reader Santa Fe
Reviews.Content: I like that it is tiny and easy to carry.  The photos are good.  It does not come with a photo disc so you will need to buy that separately.  Also, I'm still trying to figure out how to connect it to my wifi so I can download or print directly from the camera.  Very confusing directions.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Martin Sheffield
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, takes sharp pictures and is fairly easy to use. My only complaint would be for Amazon to inform potential buyers that the package deal does not come with an SD Card and is only capable of taking 5 or 6 pictures without one. Had I known before hand, I would have added an SD Card with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: HD video should have HD audio
Reviews.Author: Ben "Ben"
Reviews.Content: mono microphone? with all these futuristic features Nikon should've known better.  now I have to bother selling this on ebay

Reviews.Title: Nice compact camera.
Reviews.Author: Phillip B McNeely
Reviews.Content: Great little compact camera that takes really nice pictures.  I'm no photography expert, but the picture it takes look really good to me. Sometimes it has a hard time figuring out what to focus on, so shots are delayed, which can be annoying. Also doesn't take great pictures at night, but I am pretty sure this is common in most cameras.

Reviews.Title: Fun camera
Reviews.Author: Allen F Lessenger
Reviews.Content: It worked perfectly for my wants in a camera and has a 12X digital zoom which is fantastic in such a small camera.

Reviews.Title: Way to go COOLPIX!
Reviews.Author: Oct 30th "robpeg"
Reviews.Content: Loved this camera from right out of the box.  The pictures were excellent as well as the videos.  I purchased this camera to replace my S630.

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Grandpa
Reviews.Content: Very good zoom, easy to use, fits in shirt pocket, nice features at a good price. takes very good pictures

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Bon
Reviews.Content: Bought for vacation in Tenn. Mts. Took nice pictures has a lot of extra's to still figure out happy made a good pick Bob in Florida

Reviews.Title: Great pictures and design
Reviews.Author: Amanda J Herrlein
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera because of the reviews and it doesn't disappoint.  The only thing that annoys me is that unlike every other digital camera I've owned, you can't retrieve the pictures from the memory card when you plug the phone into the computer, you must have a memory card reader - which I had to buy.  Other than that, love it!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: R. A. Nester "Ranger Rick"
Reviews.Content: I am still not convinced the rechargeable battery won't leave me with a dead camera, so I bought a spare... otherwise I am happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great pics, but....
Reviews.Author: j miller
Reviews.Content: Great pictures.... almost as good as my DSLR (D80).  The LCD screen ishard to see in bright daylight.  Needs a viewfinder for those conditions,otherwise very good camera

Reviews.Title: Nice clear photos
Reviews.Author: KD-D
Reviews.Content: This little camera takes lovely, clear photos such as scenic or panoramic shots, and even macro shots.  It's user-friendly, and features wi-fi transfer of your photos.  The best part of this is it's 12X optical zoom.  You can zoom even farther with the digital zoom, though keep in mind that it won't be as clear as the optical zoom.  It's a perfect little camera for the price, and I personally love the red color.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: Joseph A. Natale "joe_natale"
Reviews.Content: Very impressed with the camera. It works great and the picture is very sharp. Highly recommended for a moderately priced camera.

Reviews.Title: Great pics
Reviews.Author: Jamie/Landry McKee
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this model. She uses it at work & orders her photos at the same time.Nice & compact too

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: Takes very good pictures and video.I like 12x zoom.Wi-Fi works well.takes good pictures at night.battery life is not bad.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: Vicki C.
Reviews.Content: Love the product and the price I found on amazon.  Still learning how to use all the wonderful featureson new camera.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix s6500
Reviews.Author: Nicki Drake58
Reviews.Content: I love it so far, the other camera i ordered, i took it out of the box and tried it blurry pic's an felt lighter,This camera, is awesome!! I pulled it out of the box tried it and no blur!! also it has some fun settings on this camera.Wi-Fi & GPS.. i have not check yet!!  30 minute video time, the new 32gb Class 10 card in it..and bought extra batteries..This camera has some weight to it,.. i Have A Coolpix P500, I love it, now i have some of the same features. I would recommend this camera, oh did i say i am a Photographer of Local Bands & Events around town, and Logged over Thousands of picture with my p500, and hope many more, Same for this camera, i am doing a 3 day event & a major concert in the next week, Taking this one along to ck it out.. I will leave you know... Thanks Nikon!! Thanks Amazon for 2 day mail!!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix S 6500
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Planning a trip to Peru & wanted a great small camera. This one will fit in my back pack & it has already shown me that it takes great pictures,

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: PC George
Reviews.Content: Great all around features add to the simple operation of this camera.Ease of operation and navigating thru the menus.I would recommend this camera to anyone, even a novice.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia Hayden
Reviews.Content: Takes wonderful pictures, even when zoomed way in.  Many settings to choose from, but the automatic setting takes wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, Great price
Reviews.Author: Michael S. Huhn "Mike"
Reviews.Content: Replacing a Canon that did great pictures be keeps thinking fresh batteries are dead.  This camera is even better on pictures.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were looking for a small digital camera that takes great pictures and this camera met and exceeded our expectations.

Reviews.Title: Simply, the BEST.
Reviews.Author: Fede Torch
Reviews.Content: It is simply and by far, the greatest pocket point and shoot camera there is in that price range. Absolutely worth it.

Reviews.Title: takes good still shots
Reviews.Author: K. Tully
Reviews.Content: I've looked through the menu options & can't figure out how to get it to take better action pictures - they're all blurry.  Hopefully when I look through the manual I'll be able to find it.  good quality photos, if everyone is still, but got this to take pics of the baby, who's always moving.

Reviews.Title: S6500, the good and not so good
Reviews.Author: Texguy
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as an upgrade to my previous Nikon.  It is excellent!  The only disappointment is that the Wi-Fi only works with an Android phone.  My fault for missing that in the literature.  What we need, Nikon, is Wi-Fi that works with everything.  That would make this an awesome camera.

Reviews.Title: I pressed the button, take the picture already!
Reviews.Author: Thomas H. Thompson
Reviews.Content: All I want is for the camera to take the picture when I press the button.  It seems every few pictures, the camera refuses to do exactly that.  I tried several different settings, scenes, etc.to no avail and ended up missing some primo shots.  The camera had trouble with indoor shots even when on indoor party mode.  It kept using a slow ISP speed which led to lots of blurring.  Battery life was also about half of what I'm used to getting with digital cameras and that was with the wifi off.  Also, the buttons on the camera weren't all that responsive.Only good thing I can say about camera was it took really good video.

Reviews.Title: Stars
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Spencer
Reviews.Content: 5 Stars should speak for themselves.  Lord! I didn't know this was going to turn into a freakin' essay Goodby

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: J. Breit
Reviews.Content: I had to return it because it was defective.  It would not acknowledge my SD card.  The return process was quite easy however.

Reviews.Title: Dont buy Nikon.
Reviews.Author: TDaniel
Reviews.Content: Not happy. The screen broke internally in 2 months. Nikon was going to charge me 100.00 to fix it. I PAID a lot to ship it. Dont buy it!!

Reviews.Title: Takes pictures.
Reviews.Author: J. Miller
Reviews.Content: It's fine. I'm having trouble with the WIFI up load to my computer, but I haven't tried very hard either. It meets my expectations overall.

Reviews.Title: Never buy a Nikon again!
Reviews.Author: Susan Smith
Reviews.Content: I've owned 3 Nikon Coolpix cameras since February 2013.  The first one I dropped and broke.  The last 2 quit working for various reasons after only a few month.  Pure Junk!

Reviews.Title: Looks good but....
Reviews.Author: Crmbooks2 "Helen"
Reviews.Content: Excited to receive my new camera. Wanted to use it over the holidays as relatives were here visiting. Followed all the instructions, plugged camera in to charge overnight to make sure battery fully charged....now when I went to turn on ....nothing happened. Apparently battery was dead or camera was defective..So I emailed seller who was willing to replace camera or refund my money. I mailed camera out 12-27-13 and just today 1-9-2014 he received the camera. I am currently waiting for my refund. Sadly I never got the chance to use my Nikon camera. I didn't want to wait any longer so went to Best Buy and bought a Sony DSC WX300 20x zoom and happy with this purchase

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Ignacio Montes
Reviews.Content: nice camera of a top brand as nikon. First camera i build and i am fully happy with it. Nice photos

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: John T.
Reviews.Content: Will not connect to wifi. First it says it's "Negotiating." Then it says "Could Not Connect." If it can't connect, it's junk.

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: DAV "Movie Enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome, love the zoom and the clarity of the photos. Came well packaged, before time delivery and I am very satisfied. I would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a great deal in a quality camera. Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: My order was lost and I had to go else where to purchase.
Reviews.Author: jluallen
Reviews.Content: My order was lost and I had to go else where to purchase.Very little support from Amazon on lost package. Was given only one alternative. Refund my money. Not at all satisfactory. I asked for alternate solutions to the problem, like amazon could re-ship. Was told that this was not an option.......This incident has pushed me to look to other providers.

12x optical zoom with NIKKOR lens

Up to 7 shots per second
